Teaching Assistant Project

February 13, 2017

One of the final projects from the 2017 Introduction to Python Programming course

Janeâ€™s answer guide to a programming problem where students were asked to generate words and corresponding scores from an input of scrabble tiles and a list of acceptable words. This program validates a users input, tests combinations of words against the list of accepted words, and returns the scores of valid words in highest to lowest order.

How to use

1) Run Scrabble.py

2) When prompted, enter letters

3) Program will output valid scrabble words and scores
